Description: We are looking for an enthusiastic Telesale Representative to help drive sales for our business. You will be responsible for closing sales over the phone and maintaining good customer relationships.An effective telemarketer must be an excellent communicator and have outstanding interpersonal skills. They should be comfortable recommending products or services over the phone and handling complaints and doubts. The goal is to help the business grow by attracting customers and growing the business.Skills
Skills:
Proven experience as a tele sales representative or other sales/customer service role
Proven track record of successfully meeting sales quota preferably over the phone
Good knowledge of relevant computer programs (e.g. CRM software) and telephone systems
Ability to learn about products and services and describe/explain them to prospects
Excellent knowledge of English
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
Cool-tempered and able to handle rejection
Outstanding negotiation skills with the ability to resolve issues and address complaints
High school diploma; BSc/BA will be a plus
